thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Mrs Marjorie Bell
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Mrs Marjorie Bell

author: Mrs Marjorie Bell
title: Mrs Marjorie Bell
text: Good service once a few hiccups were sorted. We were due to pickup the car at Christchurch Airport, when we arrived we tried to ring the 0800 number but because we had British phones this didn't work. We managed to contact them on our hotel phone the next day and sorted out picking up the car. We lost half a day of our holiday but were given a cheaper day rate to cover the costs of taxi fares. The car was good value for money and got us to Picton ready for the ferry. Possibly the use of 0800 numbers could be looked into when people have a "foreign" phone, it was mentioned that this had happened before.
